sermons.title: Champions Arise
sermons.description: Where are all the champions? Where are those who would champion the cause of our Lord Jesus Christ? There is a great need for men and women who will shine as lights in the midst of the darkness.  But how can we stand against the enormous giants that roam the Earth? God only knows! And He has made ample provision for those who are “in Christ.” It’s time for all true champions to arise!

sermons.title: Change or Exchange
sermons.description: People are constantly trying to change their life. But they either fail completely or the change is short lived and doesn’t bring the desired results. What is needed is a total and complete exchange of our old life for a new life.

sermons.title: Glorifying God
sermons.description: Making your life count! What does it mean to glorify God? How do you glorify God?

sermons.title: God is with You
sermons.description: Do you feel isolated, alienated, misunderstood, or unappreciated. Regardless of who you are or where you are there is one who has not forgotten you-The Lord God Almighty. And if you will let Him, He will come to you, take care of you, and abide with you forever.

sermons.title: Grace For Living
sermons.description: Thereâ€™s so much talk about grace, but why grace?  What is the purpose of grace?  Some think it is for freedom, some think it is to do away with the law, and others think itâ€™s so they can do whatever they feel like.  But not so, Grace is for living!

sermons.title: Grace: Invaluable or In Vain
sermons.description: Far too many Christians are oblivious to the inestimable value of Godâ€™s amazing grace that is available to them in Christ.  Thus they are ignoring their most valuable resource, which means that for them, at least in their daily lives, Godâ€™s grace has been in vain.  How tragic!  Yet it doesnâ€™t have to be that way.  Donâ€™t let Godâ€™s grace go to waste.

sermons.title: Grow Up
sermons.description: We all want to be treated like adults. But first we need to grow up. There are numerous Christians who have become intellectual giants biblically, yet still remain spiritual babies. Why? Because they do not know Godâ€™s method of spiritual growth. Could this be the case in your life? If so, then itâ€™s time to grow up.

sermons.title: How's Your Walk?
sermons.description: You may know what to do, but are you doing it? Does your walk match your talk? Are you walking as Jesus walked? God has made ample provision for your daily Christian walk.

sermons.title: Superabounding Love
sermons.description: We all go through hard times and encounter hurtful, hateful people. Every day on the news there are more reports of global tragedy. Letâ€™s face it; itâ€™s a hard cruel world. But Godâ€™s love covers it all! What this old world needs is a good dose of Godâ€™s love. Godâ€™s love can take it. Godâ€™s love can fix it. And Godâ€™s love can enable you to deal with it; whatever it may be.

sermons.title: The Wretched Man Syndrome
sermons.description: Life is filled with struggles. However the most wretched thing of all is to be in a situation where you’ve done all you know to do and still something is just not right. “The Wretched Man Syndrome” is prevalent among far too many Christians, yet many don’t even realize it. Find out what it is, and what you can do about it.

sermons.title: Total Surrender
sermons.description: Many Christians think they have surrendered to the Lord when it is only a partial surrender. What is total surrender, and how do you go about it?

sermons.title: Witâ€™s End
sermons.description: When you find yourself at an impasse and donâ€™t know what to do you might just be at witâ€™s end. If you have exhausted all your resources and are ready to give up, then you are finally at witâ€™s end. Which means you are at the end . . . to end all. But what appears to be the end can actually be the beginning: the beginning of a brand new way of life. And this new life is a life of rest and peace and joy. But only if you go Godâ€™s way.
